ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Essential seminar class for chemical research. Yes.
Yes, it is very interesting and gives in-depth detail of on-going research.
Yes, seminars are extremely interesting and fruitful.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Participation in academic seminars is the best way to meet top-notch researchers and expand current research applications in Chemistry by learning about current research pursuits.
Seminars are great, have more organic ones!

It is good to listen to professors present their findings to an academic audience. In addition to learning from the content of the seminars, we learn something about expectations of the scientific community and the research strategies employed by the presenters.

The departmental organic seminars were very helpful in preparing me to embark on a lifelong career in the field. I highly enjoy seminars as they help me to learn about current research being conducted outside of Yale.
